page.title: 06THE GARDEN CENTRE
page.content: The garden centre was open on the first of May 1983. The average number of customers is 1,000 per week. The centre covers 1.25 acres.They employ 10 full time and 15 part time workers.The busiest time of the week is Sunday when they can have 200 customers.They sell fruit,trees, bedding and vegetable plants,heaths and shrubs which they buy from stockists.They sell and hire garden implements . They have seven different types of lawnmowers . They sell sweets and souvenires in the tearoom where meals are available There is also a shute and swings in the play park outside
